meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Steven’s Park Golf Course
agenda_items.description: Authorize a six-month service contract to complete a sand bunker renovation project at Stevens Park Golf Course for the Park and Recreation Department with Landscapes Unlimited, LLC.

agenda_items.title: Master Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year master agreement for swimwear, pool equipment and accessories for the Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Old East Dallas Work Yard Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize an eight-month service contract to design and install a splash pad at Old East Dallas Work Yard Park.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Zoo
agenda_items.description: Approve a Supplemental Agreement to authorize Dallas Zoological Society and Dallas Zoo Management, Inc. to remove the current $25 admissions cap imposed by the City of Dallas.

agenda_items.title: Park Board Resolution
agenda_items.description: Authorize a resolution directing Park & Recreation Department Staff to oppose the granting or renewal of any further specific use permits in the area near park properties.

agenda_items.title: Fair Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the acceptance of a grant from the Department of the Interior’s National Park Service for the development of the Tower Building Mural Restorations Project.

agenda_items.title: Campbell Green Recreation Center
agenda_items.description: Authorize a professional services contract with SmithGroup, Inc. for architectural and engineering services for the Campbell Green Recreation Center Renovation and Expansion Project.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Belt Trail
agenda_items.description: Authorize an application for the North Central Texas Council of Governments 2025 Transportation Alternative Program Call for Projects.

agenda_items.title: State Fair of Texas Annual Report
Update on Enhancements & Improvements at White Rock Lake
White Rock Lake Master Plan Update
Director’s Performance Review
agenda_items.description: Closed Session to discuss the evaluation and duties of the Director of the Park and Recreation Department.

agenda_items.title: Other/Non-Action Items
agenda_items.description: Staff Announcements – Upcoming Park & Recreation Department Events.

financial_items.description: Service contract for sand bunker renovation project at Stevens Park Golf Course.
Master agreement for swimwear and pool equipment.
Service contract to design and install a splash pad at Old East Dallas Work Yard Park.
Grant for Tower Building Mural Restorations Project.
Professional services contract for Campbell Green Recreation Center Renovation.
Application for Transportation Alternative Program Call for Projects.
